text: Glen Miller Campbell (September 23, 1916 – February 1, 2005) was a Canadian curler. He played as second on a team consisting of 3 of his brothers, winning the 1955 Brier.http://www.legacy.com/obituaries/leaderpost/obituary.aspx?n=glen-miller- campbell&pid;=3122139&fhid;=5680 ==References== Category:2005 deaths Category:1916 births Category:Curlers from Saskatchewan Category:Sportspeople from Regina, Saskatchewan Category:Royal Canadian Air Force personnel of World War II Category:Brier champions Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Glen Campbell (curler)
